## ProgramDescription type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ProgramDescription = {
    program: string;
    commands: Command[];
    defaultCommand?: string;
    description?: string;
    helpFlag?: string;
    version?: string;
    config?: Record<string, unknown>;
    noUnknownOptions?: boolean;
    env?: EnvConfig;
    showHelpOnFailure?: boolean;
};
```
